Modifications.Value: Causes immense suffering to nearby enemy units, draining their life and slowing their movement speed. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 5% movement speed reduction, -3 hit points per second.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 10% movement speed reduction, -5 hit points per second.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 15% movement speed reduction, -7 hit points per second.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 20% movement speed reduction, -10 hit points per second.
Lowers movement speed of enemy units in 900 AOE by 5% and decreases their HP regen by -3.
Lowers movement speed of enemy units in 900 AOE by 10% and decreases their HP regen by -5.
Lowers movement speed of enemy units in 900 AOE by 15% and decreases their HP regen by -7.
Lowers movement speed of enemy units in 900 AOE by 20% and decreases their HP regen by -10.
